title: A good day to trie-hard: saving compute 1% at a time
dot:
digraph CloudflareOptimization{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];A[label="Cloudflare's Global Network
Handles 60M HTTP Requests/Second"];B[label="Pingora Framework
(Heart of Rust-based Proxy Services)"];C[label="pingora-origin Service
Transmits Non-Cached Requests"];D[label="Function: clear_internal_headers
- Consumes 1.7% CPU Time
- 35M Requests/Second"];E[label="Benchmarking
- Original Runtime: 3.65µs"];F[label="Optimization Strategies"];G[label="1. Reduce Reads
- Inverted Lookup
- New Runtime: 1.53µs"];H[label="2. Data Structure Optimization
- Original: std::HashMap
- Explored: BTreeSet, Regex"];I[label="3. Implemented Trie
- Optimized for High Throughput
- New Implementation: trie-hard"];J[label="Results
- Final Runtime: 0.93µs
- CPU Utilization Reduced by 1.28%"];K[label="Conclusion
- Importance of Measuring Performance
- Small Improvements Add Up"];A->B;B->C;C->D;D->E;E->F;F->G;F->H;H->I;I->J;J->K;}
